heroDescription: My name is Leonidas Adrian Mendoza, I'm from El Salvador, I'm 24 years old and I graduated from the Catholic University of El Salvador in 2025. I am a passionate full-stack developer creating innovative web solutions.
aboutDescription: I am a passionate full-stack developer, focusing more on web development using different backend and frontend frameworks. In addition to having knowledge in networks, Android application development, databases, servers, cloud services (AWS), among others. I have one year of experience, I worked on a project for the 'Government Ethics Tribunal of El Salvador', where I worked as a developer on a Laravel and MySQL project. This portfolio is my other project and is built with Laravel and React.
projectsDescription: The first project I carried out at the government ethics tribunal, which consisted of two Laravel systems, one for inventory and the other for human resources. I cannot share the code due to confidentiality but I share some images of the inventory system
